channel.title: How do i get a quick reply box for smf?
channel.description:
Me and System79 just made a new forum but we can't find how to enable quick reply box'es.
Can you help?

item.title: How do i get a quick reply box for smf?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

That is for Rc3 and Final. x]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get a quick reply box for smf?

item.title: How do i get a quick reply box for smf?
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:11, topic:34727”][quote author=Skating On Java link=topic=49911.msg615808#msg615808 date=1166050814]
Still can’t find how to add it. help me?
[/quote]

[quote=SMF Forums]
To turn on QuickReply for all new users (1.1 RC2):

[ul][li]Go to admin area[/li]
[li]Themes and Layout area[/li]
[li]Reset options (on the submenu)[/li]
[li]For every theme that has the option (some rely on the default theme options), choose: “Reset default (guest) options for this theme”[/li]
[li]Check what things you want by default. You will want to set “Use quick reply on topic display:” to “show, on by default”[/li]
[li]Save[/li][/ul]

To reset everyone to those options (warning - this will write over any custom settings they did), use the “Reset all member’s current options for this theme” link.[/quote][/quote]
What about RC3 or 1.1 Final?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get a quick reply box for smf?

item.source: How do i get a quick reply box for smf?

item.title: How do i get a quick reply box for smf?
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Skating On Java:

Still can’t find how to add it. help me?

I found it out in about 5minutes.

To turn on QuickReply for all new users (1.1 RC2):

[ul][li]Go to admin area[/li]
[li]Themes and Layout area[/li]
[li]Reset options (on the submenu)[/li]
[li]For every theme that has the option (some rely on the default theme options), choose: “Reset default (guest) options for this theme”[/li]
[li]Check what things you want by default. You will want to set “Use quick reply on topic display:” to “show, on by default”[/li]
[li]Save[/li][/ul]

To reset everyone to those options (warning - this will write over any custom settings they did), use the “Reset all member’s current options for this theme” link.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get a quick reply box for smf?

item.title: How do i get a quick reply box for smf?
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:8, topic:34727”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=49911.msg614874#msg614874 date=1166004362]

Do you mean globally or for a specific user? For a specific user it’s just in the look and layout options section. But I don’t think there is a global option to enable it for every user signing up. If you’d like though, I can have a look through the code and find out how to mod it
[/quote]There used to be a global option :[ Not anymore though.

Yeah there is. I have it set in my RC3 forum. I completely forgot how I did it though =/[/quote]
No, theres only a option for you in RC3 ive tried on mine ;.

Read full topic
